data.name: Commands_Help_
data.value: -m Sets delay in minutes. -s Sets delay in seconds. -h Sets delay in hours. -t The title of the notification. -d The description of the notification -c The count of iterations (default value is 1). --client Enables client mode (you will have to enter a server's port and IP). You can always stop the program by pressing Ctrl+C.

data.name: There_is_no_
data.value: There is no arguments given. Exiting the program. Please, enter an arguments (see --help) and try again.

data.name: Sorry_OS
data.value: Sorry, your operating system is not supported.

data.name: Only_Numbers
data.value: Error, you should only enter numbers (ex. -c 10).

data.name: Success
data.value: The program has been successfully started. Total delay is {0} seconds, iterations count is {1}.

data.name: Config_Error
data.value: Error, maybe the file "ConsoleNot.dll.config" is damaged.

data.name: Server_Error
data.value: Server error. The destination point is unreachable. IP is: {0}, port is:{1}.

data.name: Notify_Ex
data.value: Error. Most likely you do not have the dependency "notify-send" installed.
